name: NegaLib
subtitle: My personal IPAs repository
description: NegaLib is my personal repository with up-to-date IPAs

apps.name: Spotify
apps.subtitle: Cracked Spotify Premium
apps.localizedDescription: Spotify IPA injected with premium tweak

privacy.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: This lets you unlock new ways of interacting with other devices compatible with Spotify via Bluetooth.
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: This lets you scan Spotify Codes.
privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: Your data will be used to deliver personalized ads or content to you.
privacy.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: Spotify will use HealthKit data to provide personalised audio recommendations for your workouts.
privacy.NSMotionUsageDescription: We will use this to understand which audio motivates you most.
privacy.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: This lets you unlock new ways of interacting with other devices compatible with Spotify via Bluetooth.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This lets you save images to your Photo Library.
privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: This lets you listen on different devices. Spotify will also get access to local audio files.
privacy.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: Spotify will use HealthKit data to provide personalised audio recommendations for your workouts.
privacy.NSAppleMusicUsageDescription: This will let you play your imported music on Spotify.
privacy.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: This lets Spotify view and add events to your calendar.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This lets you control Spotify using your voice.
privacy.NSCalendarsWriteOnlyAccessUsageDescripti: This lets Spotify add events to your calendar.
privacy.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: This lets you set access restrictions using Face ID.
privacy.NSContactsUsageDescription: This lets Spotify access calendars you may have shared with your contacts.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This lets you select images from your Photo Library.

apps.name: Instagram
apps.subtitle: Tweaked Instagram client
apps.localizedDescription: Instagram IPA injected with useful features

privacy.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: This allows your phone to find and connect to the glasses using a Bluetooth connection.
privacy.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: This will let Instagram sync events to your calendar.
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: Instagram uses your device's camera to do things like help you take photos, record videos and use effects.
privacy.NSContactsUsageDescription: Instagram will use your contacts to suggest people and things you care about, and offer a better service. Your contacts will be periodically synced and securely stored on Instagram’s servers.
privacy.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: Enable Face ID for quick and secure authentication on Instagram.
privacy.NSFocusStatusUsageDescription: This allows Instagram to check to see if you’ve been missing notifications from friends. You can always change this later in settings.
privacy.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Instagram uses this to make some features work, personalize content and help people find places. You can change your preferences at any time in your device settings.
privacy.NSLocationUsageDescription: Instagram uses this to make some features work, personalize content and help people find places. You can change your preferences at any time in your device settings.
privacy.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Instagram uses this to make some features work, personalize content and help people find places. You can change your preferences at any time in your device settings.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Instagram uses your device's microphone to do things like help you record videos and preview audio effects.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This lets you save photos and videos to your Camera Roll.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Instagram uses access to your camera roll to do things like help you share photos and videos to Instagram, apply effects and suggest photos and videos to share.
privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: This allows Instagram to provide you with a better ads experience.
